sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const Modal = ({ isShow, hide, title, ...props }) => isShow ? ReactDOM.createPortal(

{title}

{props.children}
) : null; Modal.propTypes = { isShow: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, hide: PropTypes.func.isRequired, title:PropTypes.string.isRequired }; export default Modal
